room_title: Escape room "The Witches of Mystic Manor" by A Great Escape in Salt Lake City
room_description:
The quiet town of Roddenburg has learned to live with the local witches for centuries. For years they have gotten along in peace. Yet, as the town begins to flourish, the witches of Mystic Manor seek to disrupt that peace.

In this 60-minute adventure, you and your team will attempt to solve puzzles, riddles, and other obstacles in order to free one of your own, save the town, and escape with your lives. Are you up for the challenge?
